question: 恐慌
sourceMnemonic: <kanji>Fear</kanji> mixed with <kanji>confusion</kanji> creates <vocabulary>panic</vocabulary>! You get a <vocabulary>scare</vocabulary> so bad, you're fearful and you don't know what to do.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You've learned them already, so you should be able to read this on your own!
